title: Sophia Loren
summary: Sofia Costanza Brigida Villani Scicolone Dame Grand Cross OMRI (Italian: [soˈfiːa vilˈlaːni ʃʃikoˈloːne]; born 20 September 1934), known professionally as Sophia Loren (/ləˈrɛn/,[1] Italian: [ˈlɔːren]), is an Italian actress. She was named by the American Film Institute as the 21st greatest female star of Classic Hollywood Cinema.[2] She is currently the only living actress and highest-ranked living person mentioned on the list. As of 2021, she is also one of the last surviving major stars from the Golden Age of Hollywood cinema.
